sentence.Network_en: The moribund Post Office Advisory Board was replaced.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个不起作用的邮局顾问委员会已被替换.

sentence.Network_en: Imperialism is monopolistic, parasitic and moribund capitalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 帝国主义是垄断的 、 寄生的、垂死的资本主义.

sentence.Network_en: The British music scene is nostalgic, decrepit and moribund.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国音乐呈现出感伤怀旧、暮气沉沉、行将就木的景象。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... morbid n 疾病的，不健康的 moribund a 垂死的，将死的 postmortem a 死后的.
常用临床医学英文术语 ... sudden death 猝死 moribund 濒死的 course of the disease 病程.
GRE 单词讲义 - 小马过河 ... mortify 侮辱 moribund 垂死 mortal 致命.
...过情势的语言学家，同都认为，世上的语言，过半处于「弥留」(moribund)状态，亦即无法有效传予后代。因此，吾人，吾人之子孙…

list.abs: moribund customs ; a moribund way of life ., 过时的风俗 ; 过时的生活方式.
...创造条件 pave the way for / create the conditions for垂死的力量 moribund force垂涎三尺 unable to hide one's greed / with mouth water.
凋敝的各业 moribund industries  孕妇恶心 morning sickness  孤僻的,阴郁的 morose  生活片断 morsels of existence  ---  干肉脯 dried meat morsels  美味.
Bymoribund language： 垂死语言 ；正在消失的语言By

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Latin moribundus, from mori 'to die'

entry.tran: 垂死的;奄奄一息的;停滞不前的
entry.def: If you des- cribe something as moribund, you mean that it is in a very bad condition.

example.tran: 死气沉沉的房地产市场

means.word_mean: 1. not growing or changing; without force or vitality
2. on the point of death; breathing your last;

sentences.sentence: "the expiring man was carried home by his two friends"

auth_sentence.content: Saint Laurent's menswear line was moribund at the time.
auth_sentence.res_content: Saint Laurent's menswear line was moribund at the time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Saint Laurent's menswear line was moribund at the time.

auth_sentence.content: Thanks to incompetence Nasa is now moribund.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thanks to incompetence Nasa is now moribund.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thanks to incompetence Nasa is now moribund.

auth_sentence.content: The market for new issues is desiccated, secondary trading moribund.
auth_sentence.res_content: The market for new issues is desiccated, secondary trading moribund.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The market for new issues is desiccated, secondary trading moribund.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 死后的, 死后发生的
stems_affixes.word_buile: post后+mort死+em→死后的→死后检查尸体
mort死+al人→终有一死的人→凡人
post后+mort死+em→死后的→死后检查尸体
mort死+gage抵押品→抵押品不能动,像死的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使不灭,使不朽,使名垂千古
stems_affixes.word_buile: immortal[adj.不朽的]+ize表动词→v.使不灭,使不朽,使名垂千古
mort死+ify使……→使人想死→羞辱[别人]
